answers.author: Jennifer Kimball
answers.text:
The City of Rockville, MD has two 501(c)(3)s established to facilitate donating to the City.  The Recreation and Parks Foundation improves recreational activities, programs, parks and facilities.  Rockville Seniors, Inc. supports Rockville's seniors and the City's Senior Center.  For more information, please contact Chris Henry at 240-314-8867 or chenry@rockvillemd.gov.

author: Roger Carter
text:
Has any municipality established a charitable arm or foundation to their city (like a 501(c)(3)).  That could be used to provide greater benefits to individuals donating to the city, than would ordinarily be derived by donating to a governmental agency.
If any city has established such a thing, could you let me know, I have some questions to ask you.
Thanks for your help,
Roger Carter
City Manager
Washington, Utah
title: Charitable arm of city
